title: Plat 2 Supp/ADC Duo LFT
body:
Hey guys,

My friend (Star) and I (Candyblock) are both plat 2 and main botlane. We are looking for a serious plat/diamond team to join.
We have skype/ts etc and are pretty flexible in our availability. 

If anyone is willing to recruit us please let us know :) 
Thank you
